    * The ergonomic designed backrest of our ergonomic office chair has prominent lumbar support to fit the natural curvature of your lower back, relieving the pain of your spinal from prolonged sitting.
    * Ergonomic features as all-elastic premium mesh back, high density sponge cushion, adjustable height headrest, all provide more comfortable feelings that you could never imagine.
    * Flip up arms can be flipped up to save space effectively while out of use.
